mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_education ( member_education_code, member_id, member_education_institution_standard, member_education_institution, member_education_start_day, member_education_end_day, member_education_now, member_education_degree, member_education_major, member_education_grade, member_education_total_score, member_education_desc, member_education_date, member_name, member_employee_code, department_name, member_position_name, member_file_code ) SELECT CONCAT('MBEC','_', (SELECT MAX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(member_education_code,'_',-1)+1) FROM member_education)), #{member.memberId}, #{memberEducation.memberEducationInstitutionStandard}, #{memberEducation.memberEducationInstitution}, #{memberEducation.memberEducationStartDay}, #{memberEducation.memberEducationEndDay}, #{memberEducation.memberEducationNow}, #{memberEducation.memberEducationDegree}, #{memberEducation.memberEducationMajor}, #{memberEducation.memberEducationGrade}, #{memberEducation.memberEducationTotalScore}, #{memberEducation.memberEducationDesc}, NOW(), #{member.memberName}, #{member.memberEmployeeCode}, #{member.departmentName}, #{member.memberPositionName}, #{memberEducation.memberFileCode}
mapper.select: SELECT member_education_start_day, member_education_end_day, member_education_institution, member_education_institution_standard, member_education_now, member_education_degree, member_education_major, member_education_grade, member_education_total_score, member_files_origin_name, member_files_save_name FROM member_education me LEFT JOIN member_files mf ON me.member_file_code = mf.member_files_code WHERE me.member_id = #{memberId}
